Sentence: On the train, Harry befriends other first-year students like Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger, a Muggle girl chosen to attend Hogwarts
Harry fears being assigned to the sinister Slytherin house, but he (Harry), Ron, and Hermione end up in the noble Gryffindor house
The students are all escorted back to their dormitories, but Harry and Ron sneak off to find Hermione, who is alone and unaware of the troll
Hermione tells a lie to protect Harry and Ron from being punished
After Christmas, Harry, Ron, and Hermione begin to unravel the mysterious connection between a break-in at Gringotts and the three-headed guard dog
Because it is illegal to own dragons, Harry, Ron, and Hermione contact Ron's older brother, who studies dragons
Harry, Ron, and Hermione are severely punished, and Gryffindor is docked 150 points
He (Harry), Ron, and Hermione sneak off that night to the forbidden third-floor corridor
